name: Crazy Quilt Solitaire Classic
description:
Three crazy games of two-deck solitaire. The board is a checkered weave of cards with the unusual rule that you can only move a card when it has at least one short side free.

All three games are free to play. No in-app purchases.

CRAZY QUILT - You get two passes through the deck.
INDIAN CARPET - You get three passes through the deck.
PERSIAN RUG - No deck. Eight waste piles with four cards each.
